description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

This metallic tube has a complex array of lenses and prisms at one end and a hatch at the other. The hatch can be unlocked, loaded with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Glow Rod]{Sunrod}, and refastened using 3 Interact actions. A loaded sun dazzler can be activated to burn the sunrod to dust in a single focused flash, creating a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of scintillating light. All creatures in the cone must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] save, with the following effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round or until it spends an Interact action to rub its eyes, ending the blinded condition.

Critical Failure The creature is blinded for 1 round.
